Subject: Have you started OmniStart, The Deal Fall/Winter'25 Collection, Vision 2033 - 33 days challenge
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2006&user=10620> 	

HAVE YOU STARTED OMNISTART?

OmniSTART is designed to kick off our journey towards an Omnichannel mindset.
Aligned with our Vision 2033, OmniSTART helps us all speak the same Omni language, whether you’re in-store, online, or behind the scenes.
In this beginner-level course, you’ll learn how to connect every touchpoint to delight our customers and drive sustainable growth.

Fuel your curiosity, embrace the Omni way of working, and shape the future of luxury retail together. The course is available now <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2007&user=10620>  on Chalhoub University.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

The Deal - Fall/Winter Collection is Out

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/55c85b54a6b70e28ef56f2d27d60d0fb1443713500.gif>

<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

The Deal - Fall/Winter Collection is Out

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/55c85b54a6b70e28ef56f2d27d60d0fb1443713500.gif> 	

The new Fall/Winter ’25 Collection has arrived at The Deal! Discover the latest Ready-to-Wear, Footwear, Fragrances, Beauty, and Accessories for men, women, and kids. Now available in-store, on the app, and online.

Login using your Chalhoub Group email ID to avail your discount on non-discounted items or in-store by presenting your Chalhoub Group ID.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

Vision 2033 - 33 Days Challenge

Day 7 of our Vision 2033 – 33 Day Challenge!

Today, Vince Mule - VP of Accounting, highlights how breaking silos, driving efficiency, and embracing collaboration are bringing us closer to our 2033 vision.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2008&user=10620> 	
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2009&user=10620>  

Copyright © 2025 Chalhoub Group. All rights reserved. 

You are receiving this email because your are a part of the Chalhoub Group family.
